div.ab:
البقي سبعة قراريط ولنا ثلث درهم وحبّتين
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
الّذي لعمر عندي بعد كل حساب قيراط ونصف ذهب نفقة يوم الثّلثا
ثمن جبن دنقين غير حبّة وتمن لبن ربع درهم ثمن زيت خرّوبة ثمن كرّاث حنهحبّة
نجمة عن حوزتي تذكر عنّي نفقة يوم الأربعا

ăl bāqī sabʿaẗu qarārīṭa wa la nā ṯulṯu dirham:in wa ḥabbatayni
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ăllaḏī li ʿumar:in ʿind ī baʿda kulli ḥisāb:in qīrāṭ:un wa niṣf:un ḏahab:un nafaqaẗu yawmi ăṯ ṯulāṯāʾi
ṯamanu ǧubn:in dāniqayni ġayru ḥabbaẗ:in wa tamanu laban:in rubʿu dirham:in ṯamanu zayt:in ḫarrūbaẗ:un ṯamanu karrāṯ:in ḥabbaẗ:un
******* naǧamaẗ ʿan ḥawzat ī tuḏkaru ʿan nī nafaqaẗu yawmi ăl ʾarbaʿāʾi *** ***

The remainder (amounts to) seven carats, and in our favour (stand) a third of a dirham and two ḥabbas.
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
That which I have in hand in favour of ʿUmar after settling all accounts (amounts to) one and a half gold-carats. Thursday's expenses:
The price of cheese two dâniqs less one ḥabba, and the price of milk a quarter of a dirham; the price of oil one ḫarrûba; the price of leek one ḥabba (?)
............... dogs grass out of my (own) property, mentioned on my behalf (?) Wednesday's expenses ...... [
